name: Making it Hail
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 40. http://bit.ly/2BGGUqK 

Daydreaming, I caught myself thinking about earning more money. I felt so happy, but then nightmares started to kick in. Now each time I get paid, I feel more and more stuck unable to move forward. Then life comes and there seems to be no way around it...or so I thought.

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Walk: WASD or the arrow keys

Jump: Space Bar

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Coins weigh the player down.  After each coin grab deposit it in the safety box.
